title: CVD OOL LF TOP d3+ LANNER + (WILL GET one on once coaching session with SHOULDER RAVEN :O )
body:
Hello Summoners!

We are looking for a TOP to join our OOL team. Join the benfits of having support from the OCS team (Which means scriming them and getting support from the players.)

Are goal is to make the top 8 and then score spot in the OCS play offs.

If this sounds like your goal, then please do feel free to add me "Loststardust"

Please make sure have working mic.

Have a good day!
